chapters.title: Prologue: The First Message
chapters.info: Nae'blis, p. 16 (5)—The one who would stand only a step below the Dark One on the Day of Return, commanding all Darkfriends in the Dark One's name. The position has been promised to Demandred if he does well in his duties, but it is likely that all the Chosen were offered the position if they did well. See also Shai'tan.
